description: Ultra soft premium beanie made in Europe.<br><br>This beanie is the perfect accessory to pack for all your next outdoor adventure.<br><br>They use RWS certified 100% 19,5 micron extra fine merino wool in a 2-layer lightweight knitted construction because merino wool is warm, soft on the skin and is anti-odor and temperature regulating.
name: /29 Mid Merinoull Beanie
